extension.name: languagehotfix
extension.author: Tom van der Laan || TLWebdesign
extension.description: This plugin fixes the language files security vulnerability in Joomla! 3.10.12. More info: https://developer.joomla.org/security-centre/919-20231101-core-exposure-of-environment-variables.html. After applying the fix it auto-uninstalls itself.
